list_ex_of_english: Should a given molecule be registered more quickly or more slowly?
Economic recovery began in 1994, but the level of unemployment is decreasing slowly.
The key here is to choose p decaying sufficiently slowly at infinity.
Employers appear to have been slowly adjusting their remuneration polices to reflect changes in labour demand.
Mechanics was only slowly created by the struggle of human ratio with the empirical material.
The repertoire of collective action has changed slowly over time, usually in response to changes associated with capitalism and the power of the state.
In addition, the isotropic component is reduced more slowly as the charge of the ion increases implying low kinetic energy impar ted.
The unemployment rate was at its highest point in 1994 and it diminished very slowly after that.
